title: The Lawn Canggu Sunset (Half-day)
overview: Chill at The Lawn, Canggu's beachfront lounge with sunset views, cocktails, and live music.

stops.description: Arrive and relax on bean bags or daybeds.
Sip cocktails and enjoy live music as the sun sets.

title: The Lawn Canggu Day (Full-day)
overview: A full day of lounging, food, and sunset at The Lawn Canggu.

stops.description: Arrive and enjoy the daybeds, pool, and beachfront.
Lunch with a view of the ocean.
Relax on the lawn, swim, or enjoy the club's amenities.
Enjoy sunset cocktails and live music.
